welcome.title: Welcome to RiverFlow!
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour of the mindmap editor. This will only take a minute.

zoomControls.title: Zoom Controls
zoomControls.description: Use these buttons to zoom in, zoom out, or fit the entire mindmap to your screen.

download.title: Export Your Mindmap
download.description: Download your mindmap in various formats: PNG, JPG, PDF, Text, or JSON.

chat.title: Real-time Chat
chat.description: Collaborate with others in real-time using the chat feature.

theme.title: Theme Switcher
theme.description: Toggle between light and dark mode to match your preference.

share.title: Share & Collaborate
share.description: Share your mindmap with others or view sharing options.

viewerNotice.title: View-Only Mode
viewerNotice.description: You have view-only access to this mindmap. You can explore and export, but cannot make changes.

addNode.title: Add New Nodes
addNode.description: Click here to add new nodes in various shapes: rectangle, circle, diamond, and more.

addSibling.title: Add Sibling Node
addSibling.description: Select a node and click here to add a sibling node at the same level.

delete.title: Delete Selected
delete.description: Remove the selected node or connection from your mindmap.

undoRedo.title: Undo & Redo
undoRedo.description: Made a mistake? Use undo/redo to step through your changes.

history.title: Change History
history.description: View the complete history of changes made to this mindmap.

autoSave.title: Auto-Save
autoSave.description: Toggle auto-save to automatically save your changes as you work.

aiComposer.title: AI Composer
aiComposer.description: Use AI to help generate ideas, expand nodes, or enhance your mindmap.

embed.title: Embed Settings
embed.description: Enable embedding to share your mindmap on websites and blogs.

completion.title: You're All Set!
completion.description: You now know the basics of the mindmap editor. Start creating!
